Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Wrtyw with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding a relief adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of darker blue Hieroglyphic text; back-pillar and a plinth.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Walter Llewellyn Nash (Executors of)
